channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large potholes, 26th August
item.description:
Reported x4 potholes previously but only 1 been filled/fixed please can the attached potholes be fixed/filled O/S 92/94 & Reform Street j/w St James Grove

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Reform Street, Battersea, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous parking, 26th August
item.description:
Cars parked on the bend in Clayhill crescent which has a sign no parking and is being ignored although they know they should not park there. It is dangerous as children play around there

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clayhill Crescent, Chinbrook, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped rubbish, 26th August
item.description:
Please remove the clothing metal box as people keep dumping all of their normal rubbish here and itâ€™s just a complete mess. Also the Southwark bin collection team are not emptying the food waste bins and they are being filled with other rubbish as you can see from the picture. Please have Southwick Council teams clean up all of this mess and have the clothing recycling big black box removed as it is just causing continual problems.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ossory Road, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
This squatters encampment has been here for over a week

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kilburn High Road, London

item.category: Fly-tip Large - More than a van load

item.title: Large mattress dumped outside 20 Porchester Square, 26th August
item.description:

item.title: Old gas boiler and associated equipment, 26th August
item.description:
Has been discarded outside our house. This did not come from the house. We found vehicle details (discarded parking ticket letter) and a box with a heating engineer's name on it. It's disappointing that you're not interested in these details.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sedgwick Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Corner of Kilburn High Road and Victoria Road, 26th August
item.description:
People living in the doorway and collecting fly tipped furniture and other rubbish. This has been reported repeatedly. The Vieola street cleaners have a base nearby and have not addressed the problems.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kilburn High Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Whole road Needs attention, 26th August
item.description:

item.title: Dumping, 26th August
item.description:
Constant dumping here from the flats with no arranged collections. No support from the council despite consistently bringing attention to this. This is not our rubbish. Some of it has been there for 3 weeks. Can this household waste be removed please?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queensbridge Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
